etymology.description: phonetic: 爿(爿) (pán, "half of a tree trunk") + semantic: 戈(戈) (gē, "dagger-axe") = related to use of a weapon -> final meaning 'murder'
etymology.interpretation: The character 戕(戕) (qiāng, "murder") combines the phonetic component 爿(爿) (pán, "half of a tree trunk") with the semantic component 戈(戈) (gē, "dagger-axe") to suggest an association with using a weapon, specifically a dagger-axe, leading to the meaning of causing harm or murder.
